com.github.triceo.splitlog.api

Interface MergingFollower

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonFollower<MergingFollower,Follower>, MessageConsumer<Follower>, MessageListener<Follower>, MessageProducer<MergingFollower>

    public interface MergingFollower
extends CommonFollower<MergingFollower,Follower>
    Follower that is capable of merging multiple Followers. They receive all messages that their getMerged() receive. It is left to the discretion of users to #waitFor(MidDeliveryMessageCondition) any message or just for messages from a particular MessageProducer. Unlike Follower, this one can not tag. However, it will retrieve every tag that has been made using any of the getMerged().

    • Method Detail

      • getMerged

        Collection<Follower> getMerged()
        Retrieve followers that are currently part of this merge.
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable collections of followers in this merge.

      • remove

        MergingFollower remove(Follower f)
        Will return an instance whose getMerged() does not contain the given follower.
        Parameters:
        f - The follower to remove from the merge.
        Returns:
        New instance of the follower containing the followers without this one, if getMerged() contained it. If it didn't, the same instance is returned. Null is returned when the merge would be empty after this call.

      • separate

        @Deprecated
boolean separate(Follower f)
        Deprecated. 
        Will remove the follower from getMerged(). As a result, this merge will act as if it never knew of this follower. It is the responsibility of this method to notify the Follower to no longer notify of new messages.
        Parameters:
        f - The follower to remove from the merge.
        Returns:
        True if the follower was part of the merge, false if it was already separate or never merged.

      • expect

        Future<Message> expect(C condition)

        condition - Condition that needs to be true for the future to unblock.
        Returns:

      • expect

        Future<Message> expect(C condition,
                     MessageAction<S> action)
        Will return a future that will only return when a message arrives that makes the given condition return true, at which point it asynchronously executes a particular action. It will not return until that action has finished executing.
        Parameters:
        condition - Condition that needs to be true for the future to unblock.
        action - Action to execute when the condition becomes true.
        Returns:
        Null if the method unblocked due to some other reason.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - When already #isStopped().

      • waitFor

        @Deprecated
Message waitFor(C condition,
                         long timeout,
                         TimeUnit unit)
        Deprecated. 
        Will block until a message arrives, for which the condition is true. If none arrives before the timeout, it unblocks anyway.
        Parameters:
        condition - Condition that needs to be true for the method to unblock.
        timeout - Time before forcibly aborting.
        unit - Unit of time.
        Returns:
        Null if the method unblocked due to some other reason.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - When already #isStopped().
